_comment2: Copy to your OpenClaw config directory and replace placeholder values.

providers.name: HermitClaw
providers.description: Routes model calls through HermitClaw with credential injection and audit logging.

_setup: 1. Run scripts/clawbot-add.sh openclaw 3001 to register this agent.
2. The script will write HERMITCLAW_TOKEN to .clawbots/openclaw.env.
3. Mount .clawbots/openclaw.env as --env-file when starting the container.
4. OpenClaw will use HTTP_PROXY=http://hermit_shell:3000 for outbound calls.
5. Access the UI at http://localhost:3000/agents/openclaw/ (after login).
